name: Telegram Torrent Leecher
description: A Telegram Torrent (and youtube,insta-dl) Leecher based on Pyrogram. Powered by @torrentleechgdrivesupport!

ENV.description: Setting this to ANYTHING will enable webhooks when in env mode

BASE_URL_OF_BOT.description: I don't know what it is

SERVPORT.description: Edit the server port if you want to keep it default though.

ALD_USR.description: ALLOWED USERS [ids of user or supergroup] seperate by commas.

OWNER_ID.description: should be an integer. ID of owner of bot

GD_INDEX_URL.description: Google Drive Index Link should include the base dir also See readme for more info.

EDIT_SLEEP_SECS.description: Time to wait before edit message

FORCE_DOCUMENTS.description: Should force evething uploaded into Document

COMPLETED_STR.description: Chracter to use as a completed progress

REMAINING_STR.description: Chracter to use as a incomplete progress

MEGA_ENABLE.description: If you want mega download support

RCLONE_BASE_DIR.description: The base direcory to which the files will be upload if using RCLONE.

LEECH_ENABLED.description: This value will be considered only if Rclone is True - this may be defied now; Cuz at least one needs to be True at a time either RCLONE or Leech.

RCLONE_ENABLED.description: Will be enabled once its set. For vps, change it to True if config loaded

DEFAULT_TIMEOUT.description: If the user fails to select whether to use rclone or telegram to upload this will be the deafult.

RCLONE_CONFIG.description: For vps set path here or you can use runtime too

DEF_RCLONE_DRIVE.description: Name of the RCLONE drive from the config

MAX_YTPLAYLIST_SIZE.description: Max size of a playlist that is allowed (Number of videos).

MAX_TORRENT_SIZE.description: Max size of the torrent allowed.

BOT_CMD_POSTFIX.description: Set this to your bot username if you want to add the username of your bot at the end of the commands like /leech@TorToolkitBot so the value will be @TorToolkitBot.

STATUS_DEL_TOUT.description: Time out for the status Delete.

USETTINGS_IN_PRIVATE.description: Allow the user settings to be accessed in private.

TOR_MAX_TOUT.description: Torrent max time to collect metadata in seconds.

USER_CAP_ENABLE.description: This is to stop someone from abusing the system by imposing the limit.

USER_CAP_LIMIT.description: [<GBs of total torrent sapce>, <Number of youtube videos allowed to download>, <Number of youtube playlists allowed to download>]

LOCKED_USERS.description: No need to worry about these. CHANGE THESE AT YOUR OWN RISK.

RSTUFF.description: No need to worry about these. CHANGE THESE AT YOUR OWN RISK.

FORCE_DOCS_USER.description: No need to worry about these. CHANGE THESE AT YOUR OWN RISK.

FAST_UPLOAD.description: No need to worry about these. CHANGE THESE AT YOUR OWN RISK.

METAINFO_BOT.description: No need to worry about these. CHANGE THESE AT YOUR OWN RISK.

EXPRESS_UPLOAD.description: No need to worry about these. CHANGE THESE AT YOUR OWN RISK.
